snippet.title: Better and cleaner code: Unit testing with Xcode
snippet.description: Add unit tests while developing your app to ensure your app works as expected and fixes remain fixed as you make changes.

snippet.title: Quick resume tip: Use punctuation to your advantage
snippet.description: Punctuation can trip you up in a resume by causing unnecessary confusion on the reader's part. Remember that clarity is key. Here's a quick tip on semi-colons vs. bullet points.
